title: If you have IB MYP in middle school, do you have to be in IB for high school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on your school but generally no. In my school, both the MYP and DP programs were mandatory but you weren’t forced to be a candidate for the DP (you took all the IB subjects but didn’t took the exams). There are schools that only offer MYP, some offer only DP and some offer both. They aren’t really correlated. MYP does NOT prepare you for DP. The workload and rigor of the programs are miles away. You’ll suffer in DP whether you come from MYP or not. And not everyone who’s in MYP goes into DP. Hope this helped!
No you don't have to. It is just designed to prepare you for the IB diploma. You will find the IB diploma slightly easier than other people that did not do MYP.
